level.text: The Department shall provide all forms for registration of trade name, which shall be used to make the required filings or amendments and which will be available from the following:
Business License Center of the Department; and
Other distribution points, including electronic medium, as the Director deems appropriate.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10075 (November 8, 2002).
